historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-1527.

1973 Ed., § 43-1521a.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2413.01.

Miscellaneous Notes

Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 303 of D.C. Law 11- 111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.

DC CODE § 34-2413.10

Current through December 11, 2012
credits: (May 18, 1954, 68 Stat. 101, ch. 218, title I, § 102; June 13, 1990, D.C. Law 8-136, § 2(a), 37 DCR 2620; repealed pursuant to § 303 of D.C. Law 11- 111.)

heading.catch_text: Additional charge on unpaid water bills. [Repealed]
